title: Lightning Bolt
desc:
Post 113
- Name a round type that is in the shotgun. Then, eject the first shell in the chamber if it is not that round type.
- **Have a Nice Death**
 - Gain a random **Have a Nice Death** item upon use UNLESS below condition applies AND you got this item from this attribute.
 - If you've already used 2+ **Have a Nice Death** items this game, name a non-safe round type in the shotgun instead [can't be used if all shells are safe]. Fire a random shell from the shotgun matching that round at yourself.
_ _
